name: Rawaken
description:
Rawaken is a grinding tower defense game. You have to grind in order to unlock a turret. The more turrets you place, The level becomes harder to maintain. You can always go back to the old sectors but they won't be the same. Players are given time to plan their defense but at the same time the player can not control when the wave will start. 

                    Mankind has created the first living bot named "Norm Bot". Norm Bots proved themselves worthy for humanity creation and they are pleased to build more. One day, in the middle of creations something happened. Something that altered and corrupted their minds and humanity fell upon their own creation but they had hope to fight against these corrupted creations. A turrets and automated robot like "Nestcap". Can you defend all the sectors?

No waves but they can be overwhelming!.

Note:

Note: All Freeze debuff will remove all slime debuff.

Note: Slow Debuffs doesn’t stack.

Features (For the current release)

> Ai controlled levels

> 3 Modes

> 32 Sectors

> 13 Bots

>  11 Turrets

> 9 Utilities

Modes

Hot Morning Mode

[1] Rawdiant can be acquired in this mode. Rawdiant are used to purchase useful turrets to fight against deadlier bots.

[2] Only Solar Turrets are usable. Placing a wind turret will not work until the wind turbine is installed.

Windy Night Mode

[1] Rawdiant can be acquired in this mode. Rawdiant are used to purchase useful turrets to fight against deadlier bots.

[2] More starting gears.

[3] Only Wind Turrets are usable. Placing a solar turret will not work until the solar panel is installed.

Windy Day (Endless Mod)

[1] More starting gears.

[2] Both Solar and Wind Turrets are usable

.

BOTS

Norm Bot

> Slow and Very easy to counter.

Raith Bot

> Little faster and had an advanced interior than Normbot. Making it tankier.

Buff toward itself: Reduce Damage Taken: 30%

Norm Bot 2.0

> It’s interior has been upgraded, Making it faster and stronger than the old version. Turrets casualties 

Buff toward itself: Slide the first turret encounter

Buff toward itself: Slimed Resistance

BOAT Bot

> It has a core that is more superior than other bots. It’s very tanky and it counters some turrets that are very short range.

Buff toward itself: Reduce Damage Taken: 50%

Many more...

Turrets

GEART

> It help the player to build turrets quicker

B-Type Turret

> It's a perfect fit to counter Norm Bot because of its attack rate and damage.

Alpha Blocker

> It’s very effective on blocking walking bots.

Cager

> Cager will focus on one bot. When the bot is under cager focus, It will get trapped and get damaged over time.

Many more…

Utilities

Inn Energy Supplier

> It helps the player to produce more turrets.

Grenade

> It’s a usable utility that explodes in targeted areas.

Turret Disposer

> It is used to dispose of a turret.

Nestcap

> Cute but dangerous automated robot. It will explode when an enemy bot approaches.

Many more…
